subject: Simsonn pro x pedal control box fail
description_text:
Good morning,

I purchase a Pro X pedal set from the SIMSONN Official Store on aliexpress on theÂ  23rd April this year (2025).

These pedals have been amazing and working perfectly up until a few days ago where they stopped working halfway through a race. There was no signal being received by my computer, when i opened the software manager it showed the pedals where not connected although the led lights were still working fine.

I have trouble shoot this situation by using a different cable, checking for firmware updates and reinstalling the manager, I am on the latest firmware 2.0.1 and also tried reverting back to the 2.0.9 and even loading the Simsonn manager onto my laptop and it results in the same outcome. I have tried pushing in the white button on the control box in and back out also as well and unplugging every cable in and out to ensure proper connect.

When I try to connect the cable to my PC or laptop the lights on the pedal will come on but the manager will show that they are not connected.

I believe the control box have failed somewhat as it have been working this year just fine and not a single thing has changed in my rig.

Please see my order number 8200643109750981 and attached invoice from aliepress and also a short video showing the problem.

I hope to have this fixed ASAP

Kind regards Glen

conversations.body_text:
Hello,

It worked perfectly thank you!!
